s1ntoneli/AppUpdater

Updates macOS apps via GitHub releases

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • one-click install, update, and manage macOS apps with a simple Homebrew GUI
  • Tracks macOS and iOS software updates via machine-readable feeds
  • automates changelog updates, version bumps, and GitHub releases for projects
  • monitors GitHub repos for new releases, sends notifications via email or messaging apps
  • Weather app for iOS and Android
  • curated list of open source macOS apps
  • GUI for Homebrew package management on macOS
  • Downloads iOS apps to macOS via Apple ID
  • Lists installed macOS packages and history
